page.title: 02HORSES AND DOGS__EPPERSTONE
page.content: { Horses}are very much part of village life.None are working horses _all are used for sport and recreation. Fox_hunting and gymkhanas are held in the area. There is a small riding school on one of the farms and a small stud which raises and trains steeplechasers. { Dogs}are very popular in the village. Most are household pets and some are effective guard dogs. Many breeds are to be found_the most popular being the Labrador.Some of the farms have trained gun dogs which are used on pheasant shoots.The kennels of the South Notts Hunt are in the area to the west of the village.The fox_hounds are often to be seen being exercised through the village.
